- รองรับการใช้งานใน iPhone X
- เพิ่มปุ่มเลือกหนังตามประเภทของหนังได้
- เพิ่มข้อมูลแสดงภาษาและคำบรรยายที่หน้ารายละเอียดของหนัง
- เพิ่มเมนูบทละครโทรทัศน์ที่หน้าดิสคอฟเวอรี่
- เพิ่มข้อมูลเอ็นเตอร์เมนท์แพ็คเกจที่หน้าข้อมูลส่วนตัว ให้คุณสามารถเห็นข้อมูลของแพ็คเกจรวมทั้งหมดได้ง่ายๆ

What’s new
- Supported iPhone X
- Add button to filter movie by genre
- Add audio and substitute information at movie detail page
- Add drama script menu at discovery page
- Add entertainment package information at user profile so now you have one single place to access and manage all your packages information.

- Add instant access to TrueMoney Wallet on Discover Page
- Share your favorite movie to Line, Facebook or copy link URL

•Service toolbar on home screen : Offer the way to quickly access to True Chat, TrueMoney Wallet, TrueYou and True iService.
•TrueID Chat : Enjoy video and voice calling to other TrueID users.

•Service toolbar on home screen : Offer the way to quickly access to True Chat, TrueMoney Wallet, TrueYou and True iService.
•TrueID Chat : Enjoy video and voice calling to other TrueID users.

• TrueID TV Remote Control : For TrueID TV box customers, you are able to use your smartphone as remote control via TrueID app. Just select "TrueID TV Remote" icon in the hamburger menu (at the top left corner)
• Service Shortcut from App Icon : Tapping and holding the app icon will activate the frequently used services such as TrueMoney Wallet, QR code scan, 7-eleven redemption and continue watching your recent movie or series.
• Fresh New Look of Movie Page : Not only a beautiful interface design but The new look of the movie page will also enhance entertainment experience while watching a movie. We hope you will enjoy it more and more :)
• Bug fixed : Fixed Landscape mode for watching a catch-up TV.

• TrueID TV Remote Control : For TrueID TV box customers, you are able to use your smartphone as remote control via TrueID app. Just select "TrueID TV Remote" icon in the hamburger menu (at the top left corner)
• Service Shortcut from App Icon : Tapping and holding the app icon will activate the frequently used services such as TrueMoney Wallet, QR code scan, 7-eleven redemption and continue watching your recent movie or series.
• Fresh New Look of Movie Page : Not only a beautiful interface design but The new look of the movie page will also enhance entertainment experience while watching a movie. We hope you will enjoy it more and more :)
• Bug fixed : Fixed Landscape mode for watching a catch-up TV.

What's new in this version (V.2.30.0)
- Live TV : Easier to watch trending TV programs and quickly browse to view any TV channels you like from the homepage.
- Movie/Series : Add ‘Continue watching’, ‘My list’ and ‘thumbnail seeking’ feature in movie player to make your watching time more pleasure.
- Catch-up TV for TrueVisions members : TrueVisions members are able to watch 7-day catch-up TV via TrueID app.

What's new in this version (V.2.30.0)
- Live TV : Easier to watch trending TV programs and quickly browse to view any TV channels you like from the homepage.
- Movie/Series : Add ‘Continue watching’, ‘My list’ and ‘thumbnail seeking’ feature in movie player to make your watching time more pleasure.
- Catch-up TV for TrueVisions members : TrueVisions members are able to watch 7-day catch-up TV via TrueID app.
We update the app regularly to make your experience the best it can be.
We update the app regularly to make your experience the best it can be.

• Change your display name in Live chat : Let the world (community) knows who you are by creating your display name that represents your mood and identity.

• New TV & movie player : Meet the slick and magnificent design comes with all player controls you need. Introducing,’Thumbnail seeking’, a new feature over the seek bar to show a preview of the streaming. Plus, automatically saved your latest audio and subtitle settings.

• Purchasing improvements : Say goodbye to the old way of payment. We provide you a quicker and easier way to purchase our TrueID package, English Premier League package and movie rental. Preferentially for TrueMove H customers, you can choose ‘Charge to TrueMove H bill’ as your payment method.

• Search improvements : We always keep improving to build a better experience.

• Search improvements : We always keep improving to build a better experience.

• Super Fan Badge : Earn ‘Super Fan’ badge when you actively engage in live chat.
• New grouping in Knowledge : Add new grouping of knowledge category and enhance page experience.
• New Article Design : Revamp a new modern look of the articles.
